v.v: Protect me, for I am faithful;
You, Lord, are good, and ready to forgive,
In the day of my trouble I call on you,
There is no one who compares to you among the gods, Lord.
All the nations that you have made will come and bow before you, Lord.
For you are great and do wonderful things;
Teach me your ways, Yahweh. Then I will walk in your truth.
Lord my God, I will praise you with my whole heart;
For great is your covenant faithfulness toward me;
God, the arrogant have risen up against me.
But you, Lord, are a merciful and gracious God,
Turn toward me and have mercy on me;
Show me a sign of your favor.

v: for I am poor and needy.
my God, save your servant who trusts in you.
for I cry out to you all day long.
for to you, Lord, I lift up my soul.
and you show great mercy to all those who cry out to you.
hear the sound of my pleas.
for you will answer me.
There are no deeds like your deeds.
They will honor your name.
you only are God.
Unite my heart to reverence you.
I will glorify your name forever.
you have rescued my life from the depths of Sheol.
A gang of violent men seek my life.
They have no regard for you.
slow to anger, and abundant in covenant faithfulness and trustworthiness.
give your strength to your servant;
save the son of your servant woman.
Then those who hate me will see it and be put to shame
because you, Yahweh, have helped me and comforted me.
